greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array used for numerators of g.f.s for column sequences of array A078741 ((3,3)-Stirling2).
comment: The row length sequence for this array is A004396(n-2)=floor((2*n-3)/3), n>=3: [1,1,2,3,3,4,5,5,6,7,7,8,9,9,10,...].

The g.f. G(m,x) for the m-th column sequence (with leading zeros) of array A078741 is given there. The recurrence is G(m,x) = x*(3*fallfac(m-1,2)*G(m-1,x) + 3*(m-2)*G(m-2,x) + G(m-3,x))/(1-fallfac(m,3)*x), m>=4, with inputs G(1,x)=0=G(2,x) and G(3,x)=x/(1-(3*2*1)*x); where fallfac(n,m) := A008279(n,m) (falling factorials). Computed from the Blasiak et al. reference, eqs. (20) and (21) with r=3: recurrence for S_{3,3}(n,k).
formula: a(n, m) from: sum(a(n, m)*x^m, m=0..kmax(n)) = G(n, x)* product(1-fallfac(p, 3)*x, p=3..n)/x^ceiling(n/3), n>=3, with G(n, x) defined from the recurrence given above and kmax(n) := A004523(n-3)= floor(2*(n-3)/3) = A004396(n-3)-1.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Dec 01 2003
